pages.text: Group Events That Are Far From Ordinary PLAN A PARTY THAT GLOWS-IN-THE-DARK Are you looking to host a party that’s as wild and unforgettable as you are? You don’t need to look any further as we have all of your par-TEE bases covered. Whether it be for a birthday party , a holiday party or a company event , let Putting Edge take care of the fun for you, and we will open anytime for your pre-booked private event. To delight your guests and make life easier for you, we also have our ready-to-go party invites . PERFECT FOR ANY OCCASION BIRTHDAY PARTIES Planning the best birthday party for your kid is a seriously big deal. We are committed to making sure every detail is perfect. Learn More YOUTH GROUP EVENTS Whether it be a church group, sports team or gaming club, Putting Edge can help you plan your event. Learn More COMPANY EVENTS Hey HR rep, time to be a hero and book your next company event with us. It’s GLOW TIME! Learn More CELEBRATIONS Don’t fit into any other category? Don’t worry you don’t need a reason to get together and celebrate with family & friends. Learn More

Youth Group Events ESCAPE THE ORDINARY AN EXPERIENCE LIKE NO OTHER Our youth group event planners are committed to making sure every detail meets perfection – from finding the best date to facilitating all of your special requests. You focus on the fun, we’ll handle the rest. SUMMER CAMPS Not only are we guaranteeing a good time, but we guarantee the weather too! Don’t worry about rain or shine, it’s always glow in the dark at the Putting Edge! Groups of 24 or LESS click here Groups of 25 or MORE Click Here Community Groups We are your go-to destination for something different! We can accommodate a large number of guests at once for easy organization and an event far from ordinary! Groups of 24 or LESS click here Groups of 25 or MORE Click Here After School Programs Putting Edge is perfect for an after school destination, whether it be for a short period of time in our lounge and arcade, an hour on the golf course, or a combination of both! Company Events PLAN A COMPANY EVENT FAR FROM THE ORDINARY! Our party planners are committed to making sure every detail meets perfection – from finding the best date to facilitating all of your special requests. You focus on the fun, we’ll handle the rest. OUT-OF-OFFICE MEETINGS Tired of meeting in the same old boardroom? Get the creative juices flowing by reserving private use of one of our event rooms for your next meeting at the Putting Edge! Groups of 24 or LESS click here Groups of 25 or MORE click here Holiday Parties Make your next office holiday party unforgettable by taking it to the edge! Whether your office is small, medium, or large, we customize events to your needs to make your event amazing! Groups of 24 or LESS click heres Groups of 25 or MORE click here Facility Rentals Putting Edge is the perfect facility for a unique twist on any function. We can organize private tournaments, great meetings, or we can close the doors and invite your favorite caterer in to serve food and drinks while you enjoy our facility. Groups of 25 or MORE Click Here Just For Fun Whether you just need a break from the daily grind, want to celebrate an accomplishment, or any other excuse to get out and have fun. Groups of 24 or LESS click here Groups of 25 or MORE click here HIGH ENERGY MEETS HIGH QUALITY Let's Get The At Putting Edge, we plan special events in unordinary ways to ensure that every guest leaves feeling exhilarated.
